content: channel your inner elizabeth bennet with this elegant and romantic regency reticule this drawstring handbag adorned with luxurious tassels is such a classic way to hold your essentials i designed and crocheted this reticule to wear to a wonderful pride & prejudice ball that i attended you can read all about my experience at the ball here 1 1 http //www allaboutami com/pride-prejudice-ball/
